entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for being large and having a loud voice. He choked in his mug and dropped his steak, indicating that he was surprised or shocked by the news.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is known for being intelligent and resourceful. She asked Hagrid if he knew about the dementors attacking her cousin.

relationships.description: Hermione asked Hagrid if he knew about the dementors attacking her cousin.
Hermione told Hagrid about her experience with the dementors.
